roleset.name: light verb with 'offer' or 'bid', giving, offer, payment

role.descr: what the payment is for, might be total price or commodity

example.name: expected transitive active
example.text: It shed about 7 pence , however , after dealers said the market was disappointed that Ford did n't move to tender a bid for control of the company .

propbank.arg: a bid for control of the company

example.name: expected passive
example.text: The offer , which was due to expire yesterday , is conditional on 50.1 % of Dunkin 's common shares , on a fully diluted basis , being tendered and on the withdrawal of the company 's poison pill rights plan .

example.name: active, unexpected arg2
example.text: LIN Broadcasting surged 4 5/8 to 112 5/8 ; LIN and BellSouth sweetened their merger agreement in an attempt to keep shareholders from tendering their shares to McCaw Cellular Communications .

example.name: passive, unexpected arg2
example.text: At the close of business Thursday , Ciba - Geigy and Chiron said 11,580 common shares had been tendered to their offer .

example.name: args 0, 1 and 2
example.text: the shipper must provide some substantive evidence of his tender of the item to the carrier beyond a mere claim

example.name: with arg3
example.text: his tender of $ 100 on the purchase price

roleset.note: TENDER-V NOTES: WSJ usage does not accord at all with my intuition. It could be thatthis will have to be revamped to bring it more in line with 'offer'. Comparison to 'offer'.No Vncls. (from tender.01-v)
TENDER-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on internet exs, tender-v.01. No VNcls. (from tender.01-n)

roleset.name: inclined toward feeling pain easily

role.descr: more specific body part, if in addition to arg1

example.name: arg1
example.text: also dense tissue throughout LOQ possibly due to swelling from biopsy , area is tender .

example.name: args 1, 0
example.text: Do not use heat or cold on skin that is tender from radiation treatment .

roleset.note: TENDER-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus. (from tender.01-j)
